diagnosis.text: You’ve just been diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. You sit in your car, the weight of the news pressing down on you. Your family depends on you, but time is running out.

tellSkyler.text: Skyler is devastated, but supportive. She urges you to start treatment and focus on family.

keepSecret.text: You don’t say anything. Skyler notices your odd behavior and becomes suspicious.

options.description: Start planning for money behind the scenes.

startChemo.text: You begin treatment. The side effects are brutal. Medical bills start piling up.

cripplingDebt.text: Debt overwhelms you. Skyler starts asking questions. You feel cornered.

seekMoney.text: You remember Jesse Pinkman, your former student. Maybe he can help you enter the meth game.

pretendNormal.text: Your forced cheerfulness is transparent. Skyler begins digging into your phone calls and finances.

teamUp.text: You and Jesse cook in an RV. The first batch is a success—but Jesse owes money to a dealer: Krazy-8.

options.description: Tell Jesse to fix it alone.

cookAlone.text: You cook a decent batch, but make a mistake disposing of chemicals. Neighbors get suspicious.

krazy8Confrontation.text: You end up trapping Krazy-8 in Jesse’s basement. He pleads for his life.

jesseTrouble.text: Jesse gets beat up. You find him half-conscious. It’s clear he needs you.

options.description: Nurse him back and build trust.

krazy8Escapes.text: He reports you to Tuco. Now you’ve attracted a bigger threat.

firstKill.text: You strangle Krazy-8. It's horrifying, but you've crossed the line. There's no going back.

bondWithJesse.text: You and Jesse develop a strange bond. He begins to see you as a mentor.

powerPlay.text: Jesse resents your tone but sticks around. He’s volatile.

skylerReacts.text: Skyler is shocked. She threatens to leave with the kids.

fallApart.text: You collapse from stress and chemo. Alone, and broke, your secret dies with you.

tucoMeeting.text: Tuco is unpredictable. Your explosive demonstration earns his respect—and a partnership.

abandonPlan.text: You flee to another state. Eventually, the cancer returns. You die in obscurity.

skylerStays.text: Skyler agrees to help you launder money. The game gets deeper.

soloPath.text: You go solo. Paranoia and rage grow. Heisenberg begins to take over.

doubleLife.text: You balance two lives, but Hank—your DEA brother-in-law—starts closing in.

framedJesse.text: You set Jesse up. He’s arrested. You keep cooking, but guilt eats away at you.

drugEmpire.text: Your empire grows. Money flows. So does the blood. You now go by Heisenberg.

meetGus.text: Gus Fring offers professionalism and stability—but it's a dangerous game.

options.description: Reject him and build your own path.

prisonEnding.text: You turn yourself in. In prison, you wither away—but leave some money for your family.

neutralEnding.text: You abandon the empire. The money is buried. You live alone in a cabin, waiting for the end.

finalStand.text: You return to Albuquerque one final time. Armed and determined, you confront your enemies and go out on your own terms.
